  • Method Details

    • getRMIUtils

      public IRMIUtils getRMIUtils()
      Get the internal IRMIUtils instance being used. The discovery model start method needs the main model's IRMIUtils. ONLY call the method AFTER the model, i.e. the internal IRMIUtils, has been started!
      Returns:
      The internal IRMIUtils instance

    • connectTo

      public IChatAppConnector connectTo​(java.lang.String remoteRegistryIPAddr)
      Manual connection to a Registry to retrieve and process a stub from it. Connects to the Registry at the given address, retrieves a stub from it, then delegates to connectToStub() to process the stub.
      Parameters:
      remoteRegistryIPAddr - The IP address of the remote Registry
      Returns:
      A remote user stub that we connected to

    • connectToStub

      public void connectToStub​(IChatAppConnector remoteStub)
      Process the newly acquired stub. This is the method that the discovery model uses in "Client" or "Client + Server" usage modes
      Parameters:
      stub - The newly acquired stub
